CANNOT_OPEN_CSV_FILE: Unable to open the CSV file
ORIGINAL_CSV_FILE_HEADER: Serial number, Personnel ID, Name, Photo name
WRONG_CSV_FILE_FORMAT: The format of the CSV file is incorrect
WRITEEN_CSV_FILE_HEADER: Serial number, Personnel ID, Name, Photo name, Registration result
REGISTER_FAILED_PICTURE_NOT_EXIST: Registration failure: the photo file was not found or the format is not supported
REGISTER_FAILED_PICTURE_TOO_LARGE: Registration failure: the registered photo cannot exceed 3M
REGISTER_FAILED_PICTURE_TOO_SMALL: Registration failed: the registered photo must not be less than 5K
REGISTER_FAILED_PERSON_NAME_OR_NUMBER_TO: The length of the personnel name or word number shall not exceed 30 characters
CANNOT_FIND_CSV_FILE: Unable to find the CSV file
RECORD_INFO_EXPORT_HEADER: Serial number, Personnel ID, Name, FR time, Allowed passage, Temperature measurement, Temperature standard value
